verbose_text: The amount of EPI loaded in CPP-gVLPs increased with increasing amounts of EPI, reaching a maximum concentration of 0.39 mg EPI/mg CPP-gVLPs (39 wt%) above 0.9 mg of added EPI, which is much higher than in a doxorubicin (DOX)-loaded micelles system (the highest DOX loading in micelles is ~ 8 wt%) XREF_BIBR.
